headline: GE Vernova : commits to deploying an SMR in the United States
summary: GE Vernova announces that its subsidiary GE Hitachi Nuclear Energy is part of a coalition led by Tennessee Valley Authority to accelerate the deployment of the BWRX-300 modular reactor in the United...
